wpsSetup.description: This is the basic configuration-tab. To use Web Processing functionalities you first have to choose an available service and also specify it's vesion. With each re-selection (WPS or version), a GetCapabilities request will be executed. The capabilities response is then used to update the application and enable the remaining tabs. The tabs 'GetStatus' und 'GetResult' are permanently blocked for version 1.0.0.
wpsSetup.selectWpsLanguagePlaceholder: Here you may change the language ...
wpsSetup.chooseWps: Pleas choose a WPS from the list:
wpsSetup.capabilitiesFailed_text: The GetCapabilities request against the currently selected Web Processing Service did not succeed. Please check the availability of the defined service and try again.
wpsSetup.capabilitiesSuccess_text: The GetCapabilities request against the currently selected Web Processing Service succeed.

wpsAddServiceModal.title: Add a custom WPS service URL
wpsAddServiceModal.description: Please enter a valid endpoint URL starting with 'http:' or 'https:' pointing to a existing Web Processing Service
wpsAddServiceModal.alert_unvalidUrl: The entered URL was not valid. Please check your URL (e.g. no whitespaces are allowed).
wpsAddServiceModal.success_text: The URL has been added to the list of available services.

wpsCapabilities.description: This area gives an overview of general information about the chosen Web Processing Service. An overview of all processes can be accessed from the 'Processes'-tab.

wpsProcesses.description: This area provides you with information about the selected process, divided in 'common information' and the 'inputs' and 'outputs' of the process.
wpsProcesses.describeProcessFailed_text: The DescribeProcess request for the currently selected process was NOT succussful. Please check the availability of the defined service and try again.
wpsProcesses.describeProcessSuccess_text: The DescribeProcess request for the currently selected process was succussful.
